sentence.Network_en: That klutz lost several account receipts, so the accountants were upset.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个傻瓜掉了几张帐目收据, 因此会计很不高兴.

sentence.Network_en: Oh I'm a klutz. I can never express myself well.
sentence.Network_cn: 喔,我真是个傻瓜, 我永远无法表达出我真正的想法.

sentence.Network_en: I'm not going to pay that klutz a plumber one cent!
sentence.Network_cn: 我决不会付那个笨蛋管子工一分钱!

entry.def: You can refer to someone who is very clumsy or who seems stupid as a klutz .

auth_sentence.content: Many Nixon haters believed that the crook had been replaced by the klutz.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many Nixon haters believed that the crook had been replaced by the klutz.
